titles: A letter to the Jesuits in prison shewing them how they may get out. From Mr. William Hutchinson alias Bury for fourteen years of their society; but now of the Church of England.
author: Hutchinson, William, fl. 1676-1679.
publisher: printed for the author, and are to be sold at the Bear and Orange-tree in Prince's-street,
notes: Signed and dated at end: July, 30. 1679. William Hutchinson.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library, Cambridge.
keywords: Jesuits --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
